name: Tin Tin Hostel
address: Ng  145  nh C ng Th ng, Trung Hoa Nhan Chinh, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Well-positioned in Trung Hoa Nhan Chinh, Tin Tin Hostel is the ideal point of departure for your excursions in Hanoi. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations.

Offering hotel guests superior services and a broad range of amenities, Tin Tin Hostel is committed to ensuring that your stay is as comfortable as possible. A selection of top-class facilities such as luggage storage can be enjoyed at the hotel.

All guest accommodations feature thoughtful amenities to ensure an unparalleled sense of comfort. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Tin Tin Hostel is your one-stop destination for quality hotel accommodations in Hanoi.
